name: Star Wars: TIE Fighter Collector's CD-ROM
name_original: Star Wars: TIE Fighter Collector's CD-ROM
description:
Star Wars: TIE Fighter Collector's CD-ROM is a simulation game developed by LucasArts Entertainment. It was originally released in 1995. LucasArts Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Star Wars: TIE Fighter Collector's CD-ROM on PC.
